overview: When Chanel can't get an employee to confess who forged a company check using traditional punishment, sex becomes her most powerful weapon. Working for his wife's best friend becomes unmanageable for Ryan when he can no longer resist her physical advances. Karmen, a high-maintenance celebrity musician, uses her clout to persuade her personal assistant into doing absolutely everything - including unusual sexual favors. Romi gives potential employee Tyler an up-close and personal look at her vagina when he struggles to come up with a convincing sales pitch for a pocket pussy.
title: Boss Lady
